body.name: Terre Bamboo Car Tissues, 3-Ply, Unbleached, Refillable, 4 Pack (200 Sheets Total), FSC-Certified, Eco-Friendly, On-The-Go Facial Travel Tissues, Tree-Free, Plant Based, Hypoallergenic, Sustainable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 9 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: NATURAL BAMBOO & BIODEGRADABLE. Terre car cylinder tissues are made from natural Bamboo. Bamboo is the largest, fastest, growing species of grass, a renewable resource that helps protect the environment giving you a sustainable and eco-friendly alternative to traditional tree-based facial tissues.

HYPOALLERGENIC & 100% BPA-FREE. Our car cylinder tissues are sourced from bamboo that is free of additives and is hypoallergenic. Perfect for people with asthma, allergies, sinus infections, sensitive noses, and skin. Baby and kid friendly.

TRAVEL READY & REFILLABLE. Individual car tissue cylinders fit in most car, truck, and van cup holders. Great for bedrooms, cafes, study rooms and small spaces. Each cylinder is refillable which makes them reusable and good for the environment.

BLEACH-FREE AND TOXIN-FREE. The most sustainable car cylinder tissues with a natural light brown bamboo color - unbleached and totally chlorine free. No ECF chemical bleaching (used to make paper white & fluffy) that requires large amounts of water to process and can leave trace amounts of dioxin that is bad for the environment. Bleach-Free, Formaldehyde-Free, Dye-Free, Fragrance-Free, Alcohol-Free, Paraben-Free, Gelatin-Free, Collagen-Free. Vegan and Cruelty-Free.

4 CAR CYLINDERS. 50 3-ply tissues per cylinder, 200 sheets total of environmentally friendly unbleached FSC-certified bamboo facial tissues. Each sheet is 7.5 in. x 6 in. Soft, strong, absorbent, and lint free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute design and eco-friendly tissue box
reviews.reviewText: Cute neutral color tissue cylinders that fit in the car cup holder or on the night stand to save up space, compare to a square or rectangle box. I like a 3-fly tissue paper that is soft enough to be used on the face, but strong and durable to be also used as the oil blotting paper. It is the winner to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Convenient
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome to have at the office, car, bedroom, everywhere. They look nice and are sustainable. I would definitely reorder these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute neutrals design, love the bamboo, not super stable
reviews.reviewText: Use these in my house to take up less space that typical square/rectangle boxes—love the neutral color design. Only con is that u have to hold the bottom when pulling a tissue out so the box doesn’t lift up/fall over

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works great in the car. multi use tissue or napkin.
reviews.reviewText: It's what I was looking for. Sustainability and ease of use while traveling. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the most expensive napkins - not tissues - I've ever purchased. Look, I want to be environmentally friendly and save the rain forest. Let me tell you, I don't get why bamboo products get an up sell ticket price. You can't kill this stuff. It's like kudzu. If you hate someone, you throw a piece in their yard and BOOM! They'll never get rid of it unless they hire a pack of goats and a border collie.Bamboo is the most sustainable crop in earth. And it has some many uses. But I'm not sure they've gotten tissue quite right yet.That being said, you can stick one is these containers in your car cup holder and have a handy napkins. It's good for that at least.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These look great in the car and are soft and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the idea
reviews.reviewText: Amazing car tissues must have for running nose season

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These tissues are exactly what I was hoping for. The cardboard canister won’t crush and it’s super handy.
